attributes.action: Justice For Alan Hemmings Swans Cabs Salford
attributes.additional_details:
(1) justice for Alan Henning family bring his body back home to where he belongs streets of Salford
(2) are aim to demand impalement hazel blears Salford MP vote to use military action to locate an recover Alan Henning body
(3) 24 Hour notice served on the Islamic State IS in Syria declaration of War between the UK and those legally responsible for the Murder of Alan Hemming UK parliament authorisation to use all means with or without Syria agreement IF Alan hemming Body AND ALL BRITISH nationals murdered by Islamic IS State is not returned within 24 hours Act of War Declared
